record.name: Generate activity while Incident Major Downgrade

rule.conditionDesc: ( major.incident in CurrentRecord = false AND major.incident in SavedRecord = true)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Major Incident">major.incident</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">false</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Major Incident">major.incident</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript Validation:Change Major Incident (when ( major.incident in CurrentRecord = false AND major.incident in SavedRecord = true))
